definitions.definition: An infantry soldier , often of European Christian background from the Balkans as well as Eastern Europe and forcibly converted to Islam , in a former elite Turkish ( Ottoman ) guard ( disbanded in 1826).

subdefinitions.definition: Any Turkish soldier, particularly one escorting a traveller .

main_definition: ( historical ) An infantry soldier , often of European Christian background from the Balkans as well as Eastern Europe and forcibly converted to Islam , in a former elite Turkish ( Ottoman ) guard ( disbanded in 1826).
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively ) An elite , highly loyal supporter .
